snippet: McConkey caught passes and returned kicks for the Giants in the ’80s, and last month he competed in the 55-59 age group at the indoor national championships.
lead_paragraph: McConkey caught passes and returned kicks for the Giants in the ’80s, and last month he competed in the 55-59 age group at the indoor national championships.

headline.seo: Track and Field Masters: Phil McConkey, 55
